about.description: I'm a Freelance Graphic Designer currently enrolled at Surabaya State University pursuing a degree in Informatics. With a strong passion for design and technology, I specialize in creating visually compelling content for social media and various digital platforms. I've worked on several projects and currently working freelance at Atlus Info Indonesia, a community social media for Atlus.
about.softSkillsList: Team Leadership, Communication, Organization Skills, Team Work, Time Management
about.expertiseList: Graphic Design, Entry-level Content Writing, Entry-level Python
about.softwareList: Adobe Photoshop, Figma, Adobe Illustrator, Python

socialMedia.title: Social Media Designs

uiProjects.title: UI/UX Projects
uiProjects.description: I designed StuPlan!, an Android-based application focused on simplicity and productivity. Key design decisions included
uiProjects.feature1: Intuitive Dashboard: A clean summary of daily schedules and upcoming deadlines to reduce cognitive load
uiProjects.feature2: Smart Reminders: Custom notification system for tasks and exams to ensure students never miss a due date.
uiProjects.feature3: Progress Visualization: A dedicated Statistics Page using charts to track study time and task completion, motivating users to stay consistent.
